title: Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security Overview
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of all events.

definition.content:
[Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security](https://docs.arcticwolf.com/bundle/AES-Overview/page/What-is-Aurora-Endpoint-Security.html) is a unified solution that helpsÂ  to tackle modern threats. It provides comprehensive capabilities to detect and protect against threats across endpoints.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of all events.

For more information, see the [Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/arctic_wolf_aurora_platform/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

Provides a high-level view of all Aurora Protect Desktop and Focus Detection events by showing total events, event over time, devices, events types, status and event details for quick understanding of overall endpoint behavior.
Gives a focused view of incoming Protect and Focus logs, showing event statuses over time and highlighting critical entries to help with quick review and investigation of important security events.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates **Aurora Protect Desktop and Aurora Focus Detection** events to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security/home).
